If you want to experience being shot through walls or see what its like facing a spin-bot, then this is the perfect game. However, if you pay $20 USD you will have only have a slight chance of getting into a lobby with a hacker or if you grind your way up to level 25 I believe CSGO Prime is free. This is all thanks to CSGO becoming free to play because it was/is a dying game.

Hey! Do you wanna break a mouse, keyboard or monitor or possibly controller\ drywall? You dont? Well it doesnt matter! Just come down to counter strike global offensive and spend your life savings on a knife with a cool skin name and looks like a talon! Doppler, blue gem, ruby, WHATEVER! AK47 recoil? Its fine, just pull down on your mousepad until that mag is empty and you tag them 99 damage. AWP? Its fine, just miss 9\10 shots then get flamed when u lose the game! You play comp and only get 1-16 games? Well guess what? Just call 1-800 6969 8244 (or CSHACKS) and get a free gold nova teammate. Remember to not get too angry and say 80 n words or you might get a mute. This was sponsored by CSGOtards

Не покупайте прайм! Я играл без него читеров почти не было. Как только купил пошёл 999999999 круг ада. я так и не понял как работает античит, нор знайте лишь одно, в соревновательном режиме играть нельзя, так как система тупо пропускает людей с читами. Водите в консоль команду +left если появились плохие люди с читами
